message: I can't use Fedora as my sole OS on my desktop but I'm pretty sure I could get away with it on my laptop because I use it only for the net and streaming audio and video from my main system

I tried installing Ubuntu and Fedora on my Dell laptop.  Unity wouldn't run at all and Gnome3 ran in classic mode only.  I love Fedora and Gnome3.  I think the graphics chip on my laptop was the problem.
